document.full_text: the philadelphia flyers traded for the rights to phoenix netminder ilya bryzgalov on tuesday and will look to strike a deal with the russian after the coyotes failed to retain him.
document.title: nhl's flyers trade for rights to phoenix goalie ilya bryzgalov
lines_and_colors: the philadelphia flyers traded for the rights to phoenix netminder ilya bryzgalov on tuesday and will look to strike a deal with the russian after the coyotes failed to retain him.
